usage.cn: 爱情，要么让人成熟，要么让人堕落。
usage.eng: Love makes man grow up or sink down.

usage.cn: 不要知道得太多，会难过。
usage.eng: Don't realize too much which will let you down.

usage.cn: 美貌固然肤浅，丑陋却能深入骨髓
usage.eng: Beauty is superficial, but ugly goes down to the bone.

usage.cn: 与其平淡过一生，不如投入爱一次，哪怕是短暂的一小时。
usage.eng: One hour of right-down love is worth an age of dully living on.
